There Is this bug where I can't see my friends in the party. Sometimes they aren't even ready up on my screen but they are. Then they join a game without me and I stay in the party. Sometimes we both are ready and looking for a match, then I get kicked out from some unknown error, and restarts the glitch. This glitch is so bad that I can't recommend this game to other players that want to play with friends. If they fix this glitch then I will recommend. - 2020

so at almost 300 hours, and frequent play of BOTH sides in this game, I think I can finally give my thoughts on this game, as well as why I have decided to simply stop playing it.

This game has many glaring balance problems. From keys, to the "second chance" perk meta on survivors, to underpowered killers who cant do anything to win the game, to op killers that require zero effort to annoy and win (im looking at you freddy). But that WOULD be okay, every game has balance problems right? Nothing the devs cant work out? Wrong. This game's worst factor is it's god awful dev team, who thoroughly REFUSE to fix any of this game's balance issues. Todays mid-season balance update really highlights this. Some of the known issues that needed fixing were: keys being an instant win, moris being moris, unfun to play against survivor meta, ruin+undying, pig, wraith, legion, trapper, and clown being underpowered unfun killers to play, and awful hitboxes. what do they fix instead? Well they picked a random killer perk to nerf that had NOTHING to do with any of these issues. In fact in these random hat-pull perk reworks this update brought, they accidentally make the annoying survivor meta MORE powerful (wglf now makes slugging against ds almost a guarunteed pickup)

another frequent issue is the game breaking bugs. Sometimes, when vaulting windows, you get your ass sniped from a mile away for the most bs downs in the world, and as killer, oftentimes you go to grab someone, only for the animation to break and freeze you in place as the survivor makes their clean getaway. but the devs will never fix these issues

It is clear that the devs of this game are completely inept, constantly buffing survivors while killer gets harder and harder to play, much less enjoy. If you wonder why it takes 20 minutes to find a game as survivor, its probably because noone wants to play killer any more in this unbalanced mess of a game.

Another awful part of this game is the awful toxicity. groups of 4 survivors at once who play for the sole purpose of using op loadouts to bully the killer and ruin the game occur INCREDIBLY frequently in high rank games. And on the other side, there is next to no penalty for hooking one survivor and facecamping for the whole game to ensure you dont get to play.

One last thing I feel is worth mentioning for anyone looking to buy this game is the way updates break the game. One example is that, in this update, a specific map is broken so that there are 30+ gens spawned in at once for survivors to choose to repair, making killer games on this map literally unwinable, and because map offerings exist, almost every game features this bug.

This game is not worth your money!

I kill, but sometimes, I chill

At the time i just have 72 hours. 
Ive learned alot about this game in the short amount of time.

-Its not a hard learning game its just about practice.
-Its pretty fair game.
- Its very reapetable but still fun (my opinion)

If you like games were you doing tasks while being chased and wanna escape i really recommend this game. 
If your a person who doesnt like reapetable games i wont recommend it cause you repaet the same thing every game. Its alot about pay to get new characters to. But you can grind for them its just takes alot of time. 
But the free characters is still fun and good.

Here is what ive learned and seen the short time i played the game. I hope it was helpful and i hope you have a good day! :)
